title: Depths of Moria (3R77)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot a [Moria] Orc. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, add (2).
Lore:	”…a great fissure had opened. Out of it a fierce red light came, and now and again flames licked at the brink…. Wisps of dark smoke wavered in the hot air.”
Rarity:	R
